# calculationMode

**Instance Property**

Specifies how intermediate keyframe values are calculated by the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
var calculationMode: CAAnimationCalculationMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are described in [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/value-calculation-modes]. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAAnimationCalculationMode/linear].

## Keyframe timing

- **keyTimes**: An optional array of `NSNumber` objects that define the time at which to apply a given keyframe segment.
- **timingFunctions**: An optional array of `CAMediaTimingFunction` objects that define the pacing for each keyframe segment.
